title: Geordie Shore's James Tindale looks totally different than during days on show
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Geordie Shore original James Tindale is unrecognisable from his time on the reality bash - nowadays, James is rocking a more grown up look.

Known for some unbelievably tight, low cut T-shirts, plucked eyebrows and fake tan, James has cast off the party boy vibe for good.

The 29 year-old now opts for a shaggy, gruff look, sporting a thick beard and allowing his eyebrows to grow in all their bushy glory.

He starred in the first ten series of the show, making a brief return last year.

As one of the original cast members, he partied alongside the likes of Gaz Beadle, Holly Hagan and Charlotte Crosby.

He's now the owner of two businesses, and has an estimated £600,000 in the bank from his telly and fitness careers.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Mirrorpix)

Over the last couple of years, he's been building up his gym, which now has upwards of 700 members.

On his return to the show last year, the star said: "I'd just finished with my ex partner at the time and I was going out a bit more and it just slotted together.

"When you're single you go out a lot, so I thought I might as well let MTV pay for my nights out.

"The only thing is, I'm a little bit older now so I get hangovers.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: MTV)

"It's not like when I was 21 and could go out every night of the week, now I wake up and I feel like death. "

He also revealed to The Mirror Online that he regrets not being able to patch things up with on-off former flame Holly Hagan.

James dished: "They were saying Holly was coming back. I see Kyle [Christie] every now and again but I never see Holly and we've kind of never had a conversation since we fell out big time, and I kind of wanted to smooth things over with her but never got the chance really."

Earlier, he said of his hard-partying days: "Even though I went and got absolutely steaming and can't remember most of the night, I don't think I got myself in too much trouble.

"I'm not watching it though, I can't watch myself.

"I'm 28 years old and I don't even like leaving people voicemails, I panic. I don't even like the sound of my own voice.
description: These days, the Geordie hunk is showing off a more rugged, sophisticated look than his tight T-shirt, spiked hair days
